name: table
init_dscrpt: There is a round table with a table cloth in the middle of the room.
invent_dscrpt: A round table. The table cloth has a checkered blue and white print.

name: vase
init_dscrpt: In the middle of the table, there is a vase.
invent_dscrpt: It is a plain glass vase.

name: flowers
invent_dscrpt: Bright yellow daffodils. They make you happy.

name: coat
init_dscrpt: There is a coat hanging in the closet. It looks warm.

name: coins
invent_dscrpt: Gold coins. Might be worth something.

name: flashlight
init_dscrpt: There is a flashlight on a shelf.
invent_dscrpt: A solid flashlight. Probably would hurt if you were hit with it.

name: bed
init_dscrpt: There is a large comfy-looking bed.
invent_dscrpt: It's calling to you. You feel your eyes getting heavy.
